title: PaperWave
description: Implemented an app that employs BART-LARGE-CNN to convert academic papers into a mobile-friendly format, enhancing readability.

title: MediaMinds
description: Built a system converting text to video content, utilizing Stable Diffusion for image generation and Retrieval Based Voice Conversion for narration.

title: Safe Distancing
description: Developed a COVID-19 safety app using ML algorithms to analyze real-time crowd density, facilitating social distancing.

title: Sensor'D
description: Designed a retro arcade game integrating Arduino and other IoT devices as controllers.
